name: Leopard
interestingFacts: Leopards are known for their distinctive coat of fur covered in rosettes.
Leopards are excellent climbers and can easily haul their prey up trees.
Leopards are solitary animals and are known for their elusive nature.
Leopards have a wide range of habitats, from forests and grasslands to mountains and deserts.
Leopards are powerful and stealthy hunters, capable of taking down prey larger than themselves.
Leopards are skilled swimmers and can cross rivers and swim long distances.
Leopards have adapted well to living near human populations and are sometimes found in urban areas.
